shortDescription: Decomposes a simple polygon into triangles.

arguments.name: x1
arguments.description: The position of the first vertex of the polygon on the x-axis.

arguments.name: y1
arguments.description: The position of the first vertex of the polygon on the y-axis.

arguments.name: x2
arguments.description: The position of the second vertex of the polygon on the x-axis.

arguments.name: y2
arguments.description: The position of the second vertex of the polygon on the y-axis.

arguments.name: x3
arguments.description: The position of the third vertex of the polygon on the x-axis.

arguments.name: y3
arguments.description: The position of the third vertex of the polygon on the y-axis.

returns.name: triangles
returns.description: List of triangles the polygon is composed of, in the form of `{{x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3}, {x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3}, ...}`.

arguments.name: vertices
arguments.description: The vertices of the polygon as a table in the form of `{x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, ...}`.

returns.name: triangles
returns.description: List of triangles the polygon is composed of, in the form of `{{x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3}, {x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3}, ...}`.
